generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, which is clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks visible along the edges of the road, particularly on the left side, bordered by curbs and some vegetation.
- building: A large building with glass windows and a curved facade is visible on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are visible along the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass areas and some unpaved ground are visible on the right side of the road and in the background.

- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible on poles along the road, including directional signs and stop signs.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic lights and traffic signs.
